name: PURIFIERS
description:
NOTE : THE GAME IS STILL IN ALPHA, THIS BUILD DOES NOT REPRESENT THE FINAL GAME.

Purify as much zombie as possible to get an awesome score !

- The difficulty increase according to the score.

- Your Purifiers can be transformed into zombies when they die, be careful of the infection !

- You earn XP when you purify a zombie. When you level-up you can upgrade DAMAGE, HP or BULLET SPEED. You only have 3 lvls.

CONTROLS :

Left Clic to move the Purifiers to the cursor

Move the mouse to choose the direction

Space to purify dead zombies

Escape to pause the game

If you find a bug you can contact me on Twitter @briZoft
